quote: I ask the educational system, the parents, the church, and pillars of the community to help shape a new culture of honesty, patriotism, respect, discipline and service for young Filipinos.
quote_letters: I ASK THE EDUCATIONAL SYSTEM THE PARENTS THE CHURCH AND PILLARS OF THE COMMUNITY TO HELP SHAPE A NEW CULTURE OF HONESTY PATRIOTISM RESPECT DISCIPLINE AND SERVICE FOR YOUNG FILIPINOS
